sourcesContent:
import { Button, Input, Grid } from '@mantine/core';
import { DatePicker } from '@mantine/dates';
import {
  RegisterSection
} from "./styles";

export function Register() {
  return (
    <RegisterSection>
      <Grid>
        <Grid.Col>
          <Input.Wrapper
            id="input-nome"
            withAsterisk
            label="Nome Completo"

          >
            <Input id="input-nome" placeholder="Nome Completo"
              styles={(theme) => ({
                root: {
                  backgroundColor: '#00acee',
                  border: 0,
                  height: 42,
                  paddingLeft: 20,
                  paddingRight: 20,

                  '&:hover': {
                    backgroundColor: theme.fn.darken('#00acee', 0.05),
                  },
                },
              })} />
          </Input.Wrapper>
        </Grid.Col>
        <Grid.Col span={6}>
          <DatePicker
            placeholder="Selecione sua data de nascimento"
            label="Data de Nascimento"
            inputFormat="DD/MM/YYYY"
            labelFormat="MM/YYYY"
            withAsterisk
            defaultValue={new Date()}
          />
        </Grid.Col>
        <Grid.Col span={6}>
          <Input.Wrapper
            id="input-nome"
            withAsterisk
            label="Nome Completo"
          >
            <Input id="input-nome" placeholder="Nome Completo" />
          </Input.Wrapper>
        </Grid.Col>
        <Grid.Col>
          <Button className="bg-primary-accent hover:bg-secondary-accent">
            Cadastrar
          </Button>
        </Grid.Col>
      </Grid>
    </RegisterSection>

  );
}
